amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy", $2,000,000 for Handheld Breath Diagnostics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3523 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3523 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR S7379; text: CR S7379) To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy", $2,000,000 for Handheld Breath Diagnostics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3523 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3523 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nickles.
